comment.author: 11299198@N07
comment._content: At that time they were railway tracks, they were later connected to the tram system. I have seen photos of all four tracks on the bridge filled with locomotives, for weight testing.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/grahamh_pix] Thank you for that information grahamH. Were you referring to the State Records NSW photograph? www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/6995023441/in/set... A fantastic photograph. Thanks again for the correction!

comment.author: 11299198@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] That one and similar others. Would have been good these days if the railway still had 4 tracks across the bridge...
